BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: New American Standard Bible

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Authorized Version
Also known as "The Basketball Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Has "hoops" instead of "hooks" used in the construction of the tabernacle
14 minor editions in the first three years

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Also known as "The Judas Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Famous error in Matthew 26:36

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Also known as "The Wicked Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Exodus 20 Thou shalt (not) commit adultery
Printer Robert Barker fined 300 pounds

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Also known as "The Unrighteous Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: 1 Corinthians 6:9 The unrighteous shall (not) inherit the Kingdom of God

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: "Sin on more" in John 5:14

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Also known as "The Vinegar Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Luke 20 title is "The Parable of the Vinegar"

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Philip rather than Peter denied the Lord three times

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
Also known as "The Murderers Bible"
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Mark 7:27 Let the children first be killed (filled)

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version Oxford Edition
BibleOrganisationalSystem.comment: Hebrews 9:14 Purge your conscience from good (dead) works

BibleOrganisationalSystem.name: King James Version
